00012 #include "stxxl/bits/mng/mng.h"
00013 #include "stxxl/bits/mng/write_pool.h"

00015 #include <list>
00016 
00017 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_CONFIG
00018  #include <boost/config.hpp>
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00022  #include <hash_map>
00023 #else
00024  #include <ext/hash_map>
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 
00028 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00029 
00032 
00034 template <class BlockType>
00035 class prefetch_pool
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     typedef BlockType block_type;
00039     typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00040 
00041 protected:
00042     struct bid_hash
00043     {
00044         size_t operator() (const bid_type & bid) const
00045         {
00046             size_t result = size_t(bid.storage) +
00047                             size_t(bid.offset & 0xffffffff) + size_t(bid.offset >> 32);
00048             return result;
00049         }
00050 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00051         bool operator ()  (const bid_type & a, const bid_type & b) const
00052         {
00053             return (a.storage < b.storage) || ( a.storage == b.storage && a.offset < b.offset);
00054         }
00055         enum
00056         {       // parameters for hash table
00057             bucket_size = 4,            // 0 < bucket_size
00058             min_buckets = 8
00059         };      // min_buckets = 2 ^^ N, 0 < N
00060 #endif
00061     };
00062     typedef std::pair<block_type *, request_ptr> busy_entry;
00063 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00064     typedef stdext::hash_map < bid_type, busy_entry, bid_hash > hash_map_type;
00065 #else
00066     typedef __gnu_cxx::hash_map < bid_type, busy_entry, bid_hash > hash_map_type;
00067 #endif
00068     typedef typename std::list<block_type *>::iterator free_blocks_iterator;
00069     typedef typename hash_map_type::iterator busy_blocks_iterator;
00070 
00071     // contains free prefetch blocks
00072     std::list<block_type *> free_blocks;
00073     // blocks that are in reading or already read but not retrieved by user
00074     hash_map_type busy_blocks;
00075 
00076     unsigned_type free_blocks_size;
00077 private:
00078     prefetch_pool(const prefetch_pool & pool);     // forbidden
00079     prefetch_pool & operator =(const prefetch_pool & pool);     // forbidden
00080 public:
00081 
00084     explicit prefetch_pool(unsigned_type init_size = 1) : free_blocks_size(init_size)
00085     {
00086         unsigned_type i = 0;
00087         for ( ; i < init_size; ++i)
00088             free_blocks.push_back(new block_type);
00089     }
00090 
00091     void swap(prefetch_pool & obj)
00092     {
00093         std::swap(free_blocks, obj.free_blocks);
00094         std::swap(busy_blocks, obj.busy_blocks);
00095         std::swap(free_blocks_size, obj.free_blocks_size);
00096     }
00097 
00099     virtual ~prefetch_pool()
00100     {
00101         while (!free_blocks.empty())
00102         {
00103             delete free_blocks.back();
00104             free_blocks.pop_back();
00105         }
00106 
00107         try
00108         {
00109             busy_blocks_iterator i2 = busy_blocks.begin();
00110             for ( ; i2 != busy_blocks.end(); ++i2)
00111             {
00112                 i2->second.second->wait();
00113                 delete i2->second.first;
00114             }
00115         }
00116         catch (...)
00117         { }
00118     }
00120     unsigned_type size() const { return free_blocks_size + busy_blocks.size(); }
00121 
00129     bool hint(bid_type bid)
00130     {
00131         // if block is already hinted, no need to hint it again
00132         if (busy_blocks.find(bid) != busy_blocks.end())
00133             return true;
00134 
00135 
00136         if (free_blocks_size) //  only if we have a free block
00137         {
00138             STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::hint bid= " << bid << " => prefetching");
00139 
00140             --free_blocks_size;
00141             block_type * block = free_blocks.back();
00142             free_blocks.pop_back();
00143             request_ptr req = block->read(bid);
00144             busy_blocks[bid] = busy_entry(block, req);
00145             return true;
00146         }
00147         STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::hint bid=" << bid << " => no free blocks for prefetching");
00148         return false;
00149     }
00150 
00151     bool hint(bid_type bid, write_pool<block_type> & w_pool)
00152     {
00153         // if block is already hinted, no need to hint it again
00154         if (busy_blocks.find(bid) != busy_blocks.end())
00155             return true;
00156 
00157 
00158         if (free_blocks_size) //  only if we have a free block
00159         {
00160             STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::hint2 bid= " << bid << " => prefetching");
00161             --free_blocks_size;
00162             block_type * block = free_blocks.back();
00163             free_blocks.pop_back();
00164             request_ptr req = w_pool.get_request(bid);
00165             if (req.valid())
00166             {
00167                 STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::hint2 bid= " << bid << " was in write cache");
00168                 block_type * w_block = w_pool.steal(bid);
00169                 assert(w_block != 0);
00170                 w_pool.add(block);
00171                 busy_blocks[bid] = busy_entry(w_block, req);
00172                 return true;
00173             }
00174             req = block->read(bid);
00175             busy_blocks[bid] = busy_entry(block, req);
00176             return true;
00177         }
00178         STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::hint2 bid=" << bid << " => no free blocks for prefetching");
00179         return false;
00180     }
00181 
00182     bool in_prefetching(bid_type bid)
00183     {
00184         return (busy_blocks.find(bid) != busy_blocks.end());
00185     }
00186 
00193     request_ptr read(block_type * & block, bid_type bid)
00194     {
00195         busy_blocks_iterator cache_el = busy_blocks.find(bid);
00196         if (cache_el == busy_blocks.end())
00197         {
00198             // not cached
00199             STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::read bid=" << bid << " => no copy in cache, retrieving");
00200             return block->read(bid);
00201         }
00202 
00203         // cached
00204         STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetch_pool::read bid=" << bid << " => copy in cache exists");
00205         ++free_blocks_size;
00206         free_blocks.push_back(block);
00207         block = cache_el->second.first;
00208         request_ptr result = cache_el->second.second;
00209         busy_blocks.erase(cache_el);
00210         return result;
00211     }
00212 
00219     unsigned_type resize(unsigned_type new_size)
00220     {
00221         int_type diff = int_type(new_size) - int_type(size());
00222         if (diff > 0)
00223         {
00224             free_blocks_size += diff;
00225             while (--diff >= 0)
00226                 free_blocks.push_back(new block_type);
00227 
00228 
00229             return size();
00230         }
00231 
00232         while (diff < 0 && free_blocks_size > 0)
00233         {
00234             ++diff;
00235             --free_blocks_size;
00236             delete free_blocks.back();
00237             free_blocks.pop_back();
00238         }
00239         return size();
00240     }
00241 };
00242 
00244 
00245 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00246 
00247 namespace std
00248 {
00249     template <class BlockType>
00250     void swap(      stxxl::prefetch_pool < BlockType > & a,
00251                     stxxl::prefetch_pool<BlockType> & b)
00252     {
00253         a.swap(b);
00254     }
00255 }
